sentences.en: A buffer system resists a change in pH.
sentences.cn: 缓冲系统对pH的变化是有耐受能力的.

sentences.en: A little money can be a useful buffer in time of need.
sentences.cn: 在急需时,很少一点钱就能解燃眉之急.

sentences.en: A solution which resists pH changes is known as a buffer solution.
sentences.cn: 能够阻止pH值变化的溶液称为缓冲溶液.

sentences.en: A storage area ( buffer ) in which the first item stored is the first item output ( FIFO ).
sentences.cn: 一种先进先出(FIFO ) 存储缓冲区.

sentences.en: Consumer spending is buffering the effects of the recession.
sentences.cn: 消费支出正在缓解经济衰退造成的影响。

sentences.en: He was a bit of buffer.
Innodb tables are much more sensitive to buffer size compared to MyISAM.
sentences.cn: Innodb相比MyISAM表对缓冲更为敏感.

sentences.en: It acts as a buffer against harmful environmental change.
sentences.cn: 它可作为缓冲来对抗有害的环境变化.

sentences.en: Keep savings as a buffer against unexpected cash needs.
sentences.cn: 存些积蓄以备不时之需。

sentences.en: Matches at the start of a buffer only ( the same as').
sentences.cn: 只匹配缓冲区的开始 ( 和相同 ).

sentences.en: Romantic love will buffer you against life's hardships.
sentences.cn: 浪漫的爱会减轻生活的艰辛.

sentences.en: The buffer insertion is hierarchically arranged, as to reduce the sensitivity of clock skew.
sentences.cn: 算法中的BUFFER定位是层次式的, 有利于减少时钟偏差敏感度.

sentences.en: The DMA will first fill the line buffer.

sentences.cn: 研磨系统包括缓冲止滑结构及研磨装置.

sentences.en: The Prison Service acts as a buffer between the minister and his critics.
sentences.cn: 监狱局在部长和他的批评者中间扮演缓冲角色。

sentences.en: The world's natural ecosystems act as a buffer.
sentences.cn: 地球上的自然生态系统起着一种缓冲的作用.
